message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to be careful with my budget.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $132.5?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
